name: Meetings in the Hamptons
meta_title: Meetings in the Hamptons | Topping Rose House Bridgehampton
meta_description: Host a meeting, conference or retreat at Topping Rose and you'll get state of the art facilities in a tranquil setting outside New York City. Learn more today.
short_description: An ideal location for a private conference or corporate retreat, Topping Rose House boasts state-of-the-art facilities in a tranquil setting that is easily accessible from New York City. Luxurious accommodations are well-suited to clients and executives, while meetings spaces are complimented by seasonal snacks and locally-sourced menus.
description:
An ideal location for a private conference or corporate retreat, Topping Rose House boasts state-of-the-art facilities in a tranquil setting that is easily accessible from New York City. Luxurious accommodations are well-suited to clients and executives and our Hampton meeting spaces are complimented by seasonal snacks and locally-sourced menus provided for your group.

Located in the heart of the famed Hamptons, our facilities and services include:

  • State-of-the-art audio visual equipment
  • Complimentary WiFi as well as local and long distance phone calls
  • Spa
  • House and test vehicles from Lexus
  • 24-hour Fitness Center
  • Heated outdoor lap pool and jacuzzi
  • Guest bicycles
  • One-acre Topping Rose House Farm

We can also arrange for team building activities or group activities like a private yoga session in the Studio or Barn; cooking, wine or spirits demonstrations led by our expert staff, guided hikes and bike rides, chartered fishing excursions, or a vineyard visit and wine tasting.

Let staff loosen their ties and rejuvenate in the Hamptons’ fresh air and beautiful surroundings. Clients and colleagues alike will be delighted to participate in productive discussions and meetings.
